source: # In case there are Leavers not yet in hr_employee_dim

%%sql

-- CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW employee_dim_from_leavers

--     AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    Pers_No,
    Last_name,
    First_name,
    CoCd,
    Company_Code,
    Loc,
    Location,
    PS_group,
    Pay_Band_Description,
    Org_unit,
    Organizational_Unit,
    PA,
    Personnel_Area,
    Personnel_Subarea,
    WorkC,
    Work_Contract,
    to_timestamp(Org_Start_Date) AS Org_Start_Date,
    Leaving,
    Act,
    Action_Type,
    ActR,
    Reason_for_Action,
    S,
    Employment_Status,
    Employee_No,
    Position,
    Position_1,
    Annual_salary,
    Curr,
    User_ID,
    Email_Address,
    Pers_No_1,
    Name_of_Manager_OM,
    Manager_Position,
    MAnager_Position_Text,
    LM_E_mail,
    ingested_datetime,
    expected_from,
    expected_to

FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_leavers_temp
WHERE RN = 1;
WHERE Pers_No NOT IN (SELECT EmployeeID FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_dim)
## Load new lines for leavers not in hr_employee_dim

%%sql

-- INSERT INTO odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_dim 


SELECT DISTINCT
    Row_Number() over (order by T1.Pers_No NULLS FIRST) as EmployeeInfoID,
    T1.Pers_No AS EmployeeID,
    T1.First_name as FirstName,
    T1.Last_name as LastName,
    T1.Gender_Key as Gender,
    T2.Street_and_House_Number as AddressLine1,
    T2.`2nd_Address_Line` as AddressLine2,
    T2.District as AddressLine3,
    T2.City as City,
    T2.Region_State_Province_Count as County,
    T2.Postal_Code as PostCode,
    T3.Email_Address as EmailAddress,
    T2.Personal_Mobile as TelephoneNumberPersonal,
    T2.Work_Mobile as TelephoneNumberWork,
    T1.FTE,
    T1.Wk_hrs as WorkHours,
    T1.Indicator_Part_Time_Employee as PartTimeEmployee,
    T1.Employment_Status as EmploymentStatus,
    to_timestamp(T1.Civil_Service_Start) AS CivilServiceStart,
    to_timestamp(T1.Date_to_Current_Job) AS DateToCurrentJob,
    to_timestamp(T1.Seniority_Date) AS SeniorityDate,
    to_timestamp(T1.Org_Start_Date) AS OrgStartDate,
    to_timestamp(T1.Fix_Term_End_Date) AS FixTermEndDate,
    to_timestamp(T1.Loan_Start_Date) AS LoanStartDate,
    to_timestamp(T1.Loan_End_Date) AS LoanEndDate,
    T1.Assignment_Number as AssignmentNumber,
    T1.Annual_salary as AnnualSalary, -- T1.Annual_salary
    T1.curr as Currency,
    T1.Reason_For_Action AS ReasonForAction,
    to_timestamp(Date_to_Subst_Grade) as DateToSubstantiveGrade,
    T4.SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from) AS IngestionDate,
    NULL as ValidTo,
    md5(concat( IFNULL(T1.Pers_No,'.'),IFNULL(T1.First_name,'.'),IFNULL(T1.Last_name,'.'), IFNULL(T1.Gender_Key, '.'), IFNULL(T2.Street_and_House_Number, '.'),IFNULL(T2.District, '.'),
                IFNULL(T2.City, '.'),IFNULL(T2.Region_State_Province_Count, '.'),IFNULL(T2.Postal_Code, '.'),IFNULL(T3.Email_Address, '.'),IFNULL(T2.Personal_Mobile, '.'), IFNULL(T2.Work_Mobile, '.'),
                IFNULL(T1.FTE,'.'),IFNULL(T1.Wk_hrs,'.'),IFNULL(T1.Indicator_Part_Time_Employee,'.'),T1.Employment_Status,IFNULL(T1.Civil_Service_Start, '.'),IFNULL(T1.Date_to_Current_Job, '.'),
                IFNULL(T1.Seniority_Date, '.'),IFNULL(T1.Org_Start_Date, '.'),IFNULL(T1.Fix_Term_End_Date, '.'),IFNULL(T1.Loan_Start_Date, '.'),IFNULL(T1.Loan_End_Date, '.'),IFNULL(T1.Payroll_Area,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.Assignment_Number, '.'), IFNULL(T1.Employee_Group,'.'),IFNULL(T1.curr,'.'), IFNULL(T1.Date_to_Subst_Grade,'.'))) as RowID, 
    'Y' as IsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_leavers T1
LEFT JOIN odw_standardised_db.vw_addresses T2 ON T1.Pers_No = T2.Staff_Number
LEFT JOIN odw_standardised_db.vw_email T3 ON T1.Pers_No = T3.Staff_Number
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T4 ON "SAP HR" = T4.Description
